translations.title: Breakdowns File Management
translations.subtitle: Upload and processing of component breakdowns Excel files

messages.already_processed: The file has already been processed!
messages.access_denied: Access denied: only administrators can perform this action.

legend.title: Status Legend
legend.to_process_desc: File uploaded in INPUT/rotture, waiting for processing
legend.processed_desc: File processed successfully and moved to OUTPUT/rotture
legend.error_desc: Error during processing, file remained in INPUT/rotture

actions.title: Available Actions
actions.sync_desc: Scans INPUT/rotture and OUTPUT/rotture folders and adds files not present in the database
actions.process_desc: Processes the Excel file (only for states "To process" and "Error")
actions.folder_structure: Folder structure: INPUT/po/year/ (To process, Error) → OUTPUT/po/year/ (Processed)

delete.title: Confirm Deletion
delete.body:
Are you sure you want to delete the file {filename} (Year {year})?

Both the database record and the physical file will be deleted.

process.confirm: Are you sure you want to process this file?

form.notes_placeholder: Enter any notes about the file...
form.filename_readonly: The file name cannot be modified
form.optional_leave_empty: Optional - leave empty if not processed

create.title: Upload New Breakdown File
create.info_saved_to: The file will be saved in the INPUT/rotture folder
create.info_initial_status: The initial status will be To process
create.info_use_process: Use the "Process" button to process the file
create.guide_year: Year: Reference year of the breakdown file
create.guide_file: Excel File: Select the .xls or .xlsx file containing breakdown data
create.workflow_step1: Upload the file (status: To process)
create.workflow_step3: If OK: file goes to OUTPUT (status: Processed)
create.workflow_step4: If error: file remains in INPUT (status: Error)

edit.title: Edit Breakdown File
edit.danger_zone_warning: File deletion is permanent and will also delete the physical file.
edit.processed_alert:
✅ Processed File
This file has been successfully processed. Only notes can be modified.
edit.delete_modal_body:
Are you sure you want to delete the file {filename}?

Year: {year}
Status: {status}

This action is irreversible and will delete both the database record and the physical file.

processing.error_note: Processing OK but file move error: {error}
processing.output_note: File already processed, found in OUTPUT during synchronization
processing.parse_excel: Reading Excel file and generating TSV
processing.errors_found: Errors during processing: {num} rows with errors
processing.errors_see_trace: {num} rows with errors. See trace for details.
processing.model_not_found: Model {code} not found in master data
